original_text: Then shall he bring it to the priest, and the priest shall take his handful of it, even a memorial thereof, and burn it on the altar, according to the offerings made by fire unto the Lord: it is a sin offering.
korean_text: 그것을 제사장에게로 가져갈 것이요 제사장은 그것을 기념물로 한 움큼을 가져다가 제단 위 여호와의 화제물 위에서 불사를지니 이는 속죄제라

sentences.original_text: Then shall he bring it to the priest
and the priest shall take his handful of it
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그것에서 한 움큼을 취할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and burn it on the altar
according to the offerings made by fire unto the Lord
